snippet: We have received two or three sharp letters severely censuring us for alleged injustice towards the colored race. They are all based upon our remarks concerning CHAPLIN's case, in which we denounced his efforts to induce slaves to run away from th...
lead_paragraph: We have received two or three sharp letters severely censuring us for alleged injustice towards the colored race. They are all based upon our remarks concerning CHAPLIN's case, in which we denounced his efforts to induce slaves to run away from their masters, as a violation of law, and as springing from a "diseased sympathy."
